lead_paragraph: Lindy Ruff knew his Dallas Stars needed to do two things on Monday if they wanted to force a Game 7 in their second-round series against the St. Louis Blues instead of going home for the summer.

headline.print_headline: Stars Beat Blues to Send Series to Game 7
headline.main: Stars Beat Blues to Send Series to Game 7

snippet: Lindy Ruff knew his Dallas Stars needed to do two things on Monday if they wanted to force a Game 7 in their second-round series against the St. Louis Blues instead of going home for the summer....
